agency.body:
Blog
TAC
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

Void / Modification Window and Sales Report Submission Extended for Agencies Impacted by Hurricane Dorian in FL, GA, SC, and NC

›

My ARC Maintenance: Sunday, September 15 & Sunday, September 22

›

Join us October 3-4 at TravelConnect and hear from top industry influencers from United, Amazon Web Services, JetBlue Technology Ventures, Visa and many more.

View the Agenda

Card-not-present (CNP) fraud continues to be one of the greatest payment challenges facing travel agencies. ARC’s CNP fraud data illustrates how much fraud actually costs agencies, as well as the positive impact of ARC’s actions on behalf of the global air travel community.

Learn More

ARC is investing in the expansion of travel agency payment processing. Travel Agency Service Fee (TASF) and Agent's Choice are now part of a single platform: ARC Pay.

Learn More

Annual Agency Affirmation

Once a year you must review and affirm key information about your agency. Please note, you must disable your pop-up blocker, have Adobe Flash installed and have access to the Accreditation tool in order to complete the Affirmation.

Affirm Now

login.body:
What is NDC & how does it work? At today’s @ASTAAgents Corporate Advisory Committee Meeting, ARC’s VP of Product, Doug Mangold, answers these questions & gives a comprehensive view of #NDC in the air travel industry. Learn more about ARC supporting NDC

Learn More

Despite devastating hurricanes in late 2017, air ticket purchases to areas less impacted remain very strong in 2018. Overall, average ticket prices decreased 4% #ARCdata #SpringBreak

Learn More

The theme for this year’s TravelConnect is “Transforming Together” and will feature Dan Clay, Wayne Best and Holly Hegeman. #TravelConnect2018

Learn More

Void / Modification Window and Sales Report Submission Extended Due to Hurricane Dorian - Florida and Georgia

Due to Hurricane Dorian, ARC will be extending the void and modification window for all tickets issued on Tuesday, August 27 through Sunday Sep 1, for all agency locations (home offices and branches) in Florida and Georgia. The window will remain open until 11:59 EDT Friday Sep 6. The sales reporting submission deadline for PED 01SEP is also extended to 11:59PM EDT, Friday September 6.

ARC will continue to monitor Hurricane Dorian and advice of extensions for sales reporting PED 08SEP.

Please be safe and know that ARC is available to support your agency during this difficult time.

If you have questions, please contact ARC’s Disaster Relief Center Toll Free at 800.816.8147, or email us at ccchelp@arccorp.com.

Due to Tropical Storm Dorian, ARC will be extending the void and modification window for all tickets issued on, or after Tuesday, August 27 for all agency locations (home offices and branches) in Florida, Georgia and Puerto Rico. The window will remain open until 11:59PM EDT Friday, August 30. The sales report submission deadline for the last report with Period Ending Date (PED) ending Sunday, September 1 is also extended to 11:59 EDT Friday, September 6.

Please be safe and know that ARC is available to support your agency during this difficult time.

If you have questions, please contact ARC’s Disaster Relief Center Toll Free at 800.816.8147, or email us at ccchelp@arccorp.com.

Join us October 3-4 at TravelConnect and hear from top industry influencers from United, Amazon Web Services, JetBlue Technology Ventures, Visa and many more.

View the Agenda

Card-not-present (CNP) fraud continues to be one of the greatest payment challenges facing travel agencies. ARC’s CNP fraud data illustrates how much fraud actually costs agencies, as well as the positive impact of ARC’s actions on behalf of the global air travel community.

Learn More

ARC is investing in the expansion of travel agency payment processing. Travel Agency Service Fee (TASF) and Agent's Choice are now part of a single platform: ARC Pay.

Learn More

Annual Agency Affirmation

Once a year you must review and affirm key information about your agency. Please note, you must disable your pop-up blocker, have Adobe Flash installed and have access to the Accreditation tool in order to complete the Affirmation.

Affirm Now

ARC ANNOUCEMENT

Void / Modification Window and Sales Report Submission Extended Due to Tropical Storm Dorian - Florida, Georgia and Puerto Rico

Due to Tropical Storm Dorian, ARC will be extending the void and modification window for all tickets issued on, or after Tuesday, August 27 for all agency locations (home offices and branches) in Florida, Georgia and Puerto Rico. The window will remain open until 11:59PM EDT Friday, August 30. The sales report submission deadline for the last report with Period Ending Date (PED) ending Sunday, September 1 is also extended to 11:59 EDT Friday, September 6.

Please be safe and know that ARC is available to support your agency during this difficult time.

If you have questions, please contact ARC’s Disaster Relief Center Toll Free at 800.816.8147, or email us at ccchelp@arccorp.com.

Join us October 3-4 at TravelConnect! Hear from travel industry leaders such as Scott Kirby, president of United Airlines, who will discuss the opportunities and challenges ahead for air travel.

Register Today

ARC ANNOUCEMENT

Void / Modification Window and Sales Report Submission Extended Due to Tropical Storm Dorian - Florida, Georgia and Puerto Rico

Due to Tropical Storm Dorian, ARC will be extending the void and modification window for all tickets issued on, or after Tuesday, August 27 for all agency locations (home offices and branches) in Florida, Georgia and Puerto Rico. The window will remain open until 11:59PM EDT Friday, August 30. The sales report submission deadline for the last report with Period Ending Date (PED) ending Sunday, September 1 is also extended to 11:59 EDT Friday, September 6.

Please be safe and know that ARC is available to support your agency during this difficult time.

If you have questions, please contact ARC’s Disaster Relief Center Toll Free at 800.816.8147, or email us at ccchelp@arccorp.com.

Join us October 3-4 at TravelConnect! Hear from travel industry leaders such as Scott Kirby, president of United Airlines, who will discuss the opportunities and challenges ahead for air travel.

Register Today

Void / Modification Window and Sales Report Submission Extended Due to Hurricane Dorian - Florida and Georgia

Due to Hurricane Dorian, ARC will be extending the void and modification window for all tickets issued on Tuesday, August 27 through Sunday Sep 1, for all agency locations (home offices and branches) in Florida and Georgia. The window will remain open until 11:59 EDT Friday Sep 6. The sales reporting submission deadline for PED 01SEP is also extended to 11:59PM EDT, Friday September 6.

ARC will continue to monitor Hurricane Dorian and advice of extensions for sales reporting PED 08SEP.

Please be safe and know that ARC is available to support your agency during this difficult time.

If you have questions, please contact ARC’s Disaster Relief Center Toll Free at 800.816.8147, or email us at ccchelp@arccorp.com.

Join us October 3-4 at TravelConnect! Hear from travel industry leaders such as Scott Kirby, president of United Airlines, who will discuss the opportunities and challenges ahead for air travel.
